name: CapivaRIO
description:
Inspired by Spyro and A Short Hike, CapivaRio is a game about exploration and cute animals.

The game is still under development and only available in the Brazilian Portuguese language. The current version has one fully playable level that shows some of the main mechanics and dynamics of the game.

If you enjoy it, feel free to help us by donating.

You can find our Crowdfunding campaign here: Catarse
